title: Let’s Get Wild!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Heeey, Makki~! Over here~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I see you, okay? You don’t have to jump around like that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>But it was easier to find me, right? Hm, wait, is something different about you today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh? What part?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>You look really sporty.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>....I don’t necessarily think so.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai gets it. There’s no need to be embarrassed. You came here with clothes that are easy to move around in so you can cheer for AZALEA on their live, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>As I said, it’s not like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Really? Then you must be looking forward to it so much that you unconsciously chose that getup! That happened to me too! Let’s have a ton of fun today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Geez, listen to me~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
